<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 20"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Hex Master](/Feats.aspx?ID=1590) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Witch" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=323" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 105 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You embody the link to your patron so completely that you can cast your hexes in rapid succession. You are no longer limited to casting only a single hex each turn. In addition, when you cast [_cackle_](/Spells.aspx?ID=792) to sustain a hex, you gain the effects of Sustain a Spell for all your active hexes that have a duration of sustained.
name: Hex Master
